medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment by which the sender must uniquely identify the invoice by means of its type and number and when necessary its function.

medi:field.name: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE NAME
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a type of document/message by code or name. Code preferred.

medi:component.name: Document/message name, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Document/message identifier expressed in code.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Document/message name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Plain language identifier specifying the function of a document/message.

medi:field.name: Document/message number
medi:field.medi:documentation: Reference number assigned to the document/message by the issuer.

medi:field.name: Message function, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating the function of the message.

medi:field.name: Response type, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the type of acknowledgment required or transmitted.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
DTM, A segment specifying general dates and, when relevant, times related to the whole message. The segment must be specified at least once to identify the invoice date. Examples of the use of this DTM segment is: "shipped on date" or "delivery date"
The Date/time/period segment within other Segment groups should be used whenever the date/time/period requires to be logically related to another specified data item e.g. Payment due date is specified within the PAT Segment group.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segment.name: Payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, A segment requesting or confirming conditions of payment, guarantee and method of payment for the whole invoice. An example of the use of this segment is to specify the type of documentary credit used in the transaction.

medi:field.name: PAYMENT INSTRUCTION DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of method of payment employed or to be employed.

medi:component.name: Payment conditions, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the method employed or to be employed in order that a payment may be made or regarded as made. The method may or may not be tied to a guarantee.

medi:component.name: Payment guarantee, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the means of guarantee.

medi:component.name: Payment means, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the instrument of payment, which may include a guarantee.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Payment channel, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the channel of payment.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating special conditions related to the total invoice owing to origin, customs preference or other commercial factors.

medi:field.name: Country of origin, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Country in which the goods have been produced or manufactured, according to criteria laid down for the purposes of application of the Customs tariff, of quantitative restrictions, or of any other measure related to trade.

medi:field.name: Type of duty regime, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the statement of the full/preferential regime according to which duty is assessed.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment providing a description common to all line items of the invoice.

medi:field.name: Item description type, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating the format of a description.

medi:field.name: Item characteristic, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the item characteristic being described.

medi:field.name: ITEM DESCRIPTION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code of a standard article description from a specified source.

medi:component.name: Item description identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code from an industry code list which provides specific data about a product characteristic.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Item description
medi:component.medi:documentation: Plain language description of articles or products.

medi:component.name: Item description
medi:component.medi:documentation: Plain language description of articles or products.

medi:field.name: Surface/layer indicator, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating the surface or layer of a product that is being described.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually

medi:field.name: Text subject qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying subject of a free text.

medi:field.name: Text function, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying how to handle the text.

medi:field.name: TEXT REFERENCE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Coded reference to a standard text and its source.

medi:component.name: Free text, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free text in coded form.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.name: TEXT LITERAL
medi:field.medi:documentation: Free text; one to five lines.

medi:component.name: Free text
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free text field available to the message sender for information.

medi:component.name: Free text
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free text field available to the message sender for information.

medi:component.name: Free text
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free text field available to the message sender for information.

medi:component.name: Free text
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free text field available to the message sender for information.

medi:component.name: Free text
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free text field available to the message sender for information.

medi:field.name: Language, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code of language (ISO 639-1988).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 1: A group of segments for giving references and where necessary, their dates, relating to the whole message, e.g. contract number, import/export license number, despatch advice number.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:field.name: REFERENCE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.name: Reference qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a reference segment or a reference number.

medi:component.name: Reference number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification number the nature and function of which can be qualified by an entry in data element 1153 Reference qualifier.

medi:component.name: Line number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of the line in the document/message referenced in 1154 Reference number.

medi:component.name: Reference version number
medi:component.medi:documentation: To uniquely identify a reference by its revision number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date/time related to the reference.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 2: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties, in coded or clear form, and their functions relevant to the invoice. Identification of the seller and buyer parties is mandatory for the invoice message. It is recommended that where possible only the coded form of the party ID should be specified e.g. The Buyer and Seller are known to each other, thus only the coded ID is required, but the Consignee or Delivery address may vary and would have to be clearly specified, preferably in structured format.

medi:field.name: Party qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.

medi:field.name: PARTY IDENTIFICATION DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a transaction party by code.

medi:component.name: Party id identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying a party involved in a transaction.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.name: NAME AND ADDRESS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Unstructured name and address: one to five lines.

medi:component.name: Name and address line
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form name and address description.

medi:component.name: Name and address line
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form name and address description.

medi:component.name: Name and address line
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form name and address description.

medi:component.name: Name and address line
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form name and address description.

medi:component.name: Name and address line
medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form name and address description.

medi:field.name: PARTY NAME
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a transaction party by name, one to five lines. Party name may be formatted.

medi:component.name: Party name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party involved in a transaction.

medi:component.name: Party name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party involved in a transaction.

medi:component.name: Party name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party involved in a transaction.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party involved in a transaction.

medi:component.name: Party name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party involved in a transaction.

medi:component.name: Party name format, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a party name.

medi:field.name: STREET
medi:field.medi:documentation: Street address and/or PO Box number in a structured address: one to three lines.

medi:component.name: Street and number/P.O. Box
medi:component.medi:documentation: Street and number in plain language, or Post Office Box No.

medi:component.name: Street and number/P.O. Box
medi:component.medi:documentation: Street and number in plain language, or Post Office Box No.

medi:component.name: Street and number/P.O. Box
medi:component.medi:documentation: Street and number in plain language, or Post Office Box No.

medi:field.name: City name
medi:field.medi:documentation: Name of a city (a town, a village) for addressing purposes.

medi:field.name: Country sub-entity identification
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of sub-entities (state, province) defined by appropriate governmental agencies.

medi:field.name: Postcode identification
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code defining postal zones or addresses.

medi:field.name: Country, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of a country or other geographical entity as specified in ISO 3166.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving more specific location information of the party specified in the NAD segment e.g. internal site/building number.

medi:field.name: Place/location qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the function of a location.

medi:field.name: LOCATION IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a location by code or name.

medi:component.name: Place/location identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of place/location, other than 3164 City name.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Place/location
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of place/location, other than 3164 City name.

medi:field.name: RELATED LOCATION ONE IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification the first related location by code or name.

medi:component.name: Related place/location one identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the first related place/location by code.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Related place/location one
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the first related place/location by name.

medi:field.name: RELATED LOCATION TWO IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of second related location by code or name.

medi:component.name: Related place/location two identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of a second related place/location by code.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Related place/location two
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of a second related place/location by name.

medi:field.name: Relation, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify the relationship between two or more items.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution (e.g. bank) and relevant account numbers for the seller, buyer and where necessary other parties.

medi:field.name: Party qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.

medi:field.name: ACCOUNT IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of an account holder by account number and/or account holder name in one or two lines. Number preferred.

medi:component.name: Account holder number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Account number of the holder of the account.

medi:component.name: Account holder name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of the holder of the account.

medi:component.name: Account holder name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of the holder of the account.

medi:component.name: Currency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name or symbol of the monetary unit involved in the transaction.

medi:field.name: INSTITUTION IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a financial institution by code branch number, or name and name of place. Code or branch number preferred.

medi:component.name: Institution name identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying an institution.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Institution branch number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number identifying a branch of an institution.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Institution name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of an institution.

medi:component.name: Institution branch place
medi:component.medi:documentation: Official name of the place where the institution branch is situated.

medi:field.name: Country, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of a country or other geographical entity as specified in ISO 3166.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 3: A group of segment for giving references only relevant to the specified party rather than the whole invoice.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:field.name: REFERENCE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.name: Reference qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a reference segment or a reference number.

medi:component.name: Reference number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification number the nature and function of which can be qualified by an entry in data element 1153 Reference qualifier.

medi:component.name: Line number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of the line in the document/message referenced in 1154 Reference number.

medi:component.name: Reference version number
medi:component.medi:documentation: To uniquely identify a reference by its revision number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 4: A group of segments identifying the documentary requirements of the specified party.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying and providing information relating to the documents required by the party specified by the NAD segment.

medi:field.name: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE NAME
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a type of document/message by code or name. Code preferred.

medi:component.name: Document/message name, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Document/message identifier expressed in code.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Document/message name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Plain language identifier specifying the function of a document/message.

medi:field.name: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of document/message by number, status, source and/or language.

medi:component.name: Document/message number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Reference number assigned to the document/message by the issuer.

medi:component.name: Document/message status, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify the status of a document/message.

medi:component.name: Document/message source
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the source from which the printed information is to be or has been obtained.

medi:component.name: Language, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code of language (ISO 639-1988).

medi:field.name: Communication channel identifier, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the type of communication channel being used.

medi:field.name: Number of copies of document required
medi:field.medi:documentation: Number of originals or copies of a document stipulated or referred to as being required.

medi:field.name: Number of originals of document required
medi:field.medi:documentation: Specification of the number of originals of a stipulated document that are required.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time of the document.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 5: A group of segments giving contact details of the specific person or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:field.name: Contact function, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g. department or person).

medi:field.name: DEPARTMENT OR EMPLOYEE DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code and/or name of a department or employee. Code preferred.

medi:component.name: Department or employee identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Internal identification code.

medi:component.name: Department or employee
medi:component.medi:documentation: The department or person within an organizational entity.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communications type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:field.name: COMMUNICATION CONTACT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Communication number of a department or employee in a specified channel.

medi:component.name: Communication number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Complete communication number including country or area code when applicable. Also see: 3153 Communication channel identifier.

medi:component.name: Communication channel qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the type of communication channel being used.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 6: A group of segments specifying tax related information, and when necessary, the location(s) to which that tax information relates.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying a tax type, category and rate or exemption, relating to the whole invoice e.g. Value Added Tax at the standard rate is applicable for all items.

medi:field.name: Duty/tax/fee function qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the function of an duty, tax or fee information.

medi:field.name: DUTY/TAX/FEE TYPE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code and/or name identifying duty, tax or fee.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee type, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of duty or tax or fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee type
medi:component.medi:documentation: Type of duty or tax or fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services.

medi:field.name: DUTY/TAX/FEE ACCOUNT DETAIL
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of account reference for duties, taxes and/or fees.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee account identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a particular duty, tax or fee.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.name: Duty/tax/fee assessment basis
medi:field.medi:documentation: Value or quantity on which a duty or tax will be assessed.

medi:field.name: DUTY/TAX/FEE DETAIL
medi:field.medi:documentation: Rate of duty/tax/fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee rate identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the rate of duty or tax or fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee rate
medi:component.medi:documentation: Rate of duty or tax or fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee rate basis identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the various elements of tax combination to be attributed to a commodity.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.name: Duty/tax/fee category, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying a tax/duty/fee category within a tax/duty/fee type system.

medi:field.name: Party tax identification number
medi:field.medi:documentation: Number assigned to a purchaser (buyer, orderer) by a tax jurisdiction (state, country, etc).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount for the identified tax/fee.

medi:field.name: MONETARY AMOUNT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetary amount in a specified currency.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount type qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of type of amount.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of monetary units.

medi:component.name: Currency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name or symbol of the monetary unit involved in the transaction.

medi:component.name: Currency qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to data element 6345 Currency.

medi:component.name: Status, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Provides information regarding the status of an instruction.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating the location to which the tax or exemption specified in the TAX segment applies, e.g. city or state or country tax.

medi:field.name: Place/location qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the function of a location.

medi:field.name: LOCATION IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a location by code or name.

medi:component.name: Place/location identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of place/location, other than 3164 City name.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Place/location
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of place/location, other than 3164 City name.

medi:field.name: RELATED LOCATION ONE IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification the first related location by code or name.

medi:component.name: Related place/location one identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the first related place/location by code.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Related place/location one
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the first related place/location by name.

medi:field.name: RELATED LOCATION TWO IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of second related location by code or name.

medi:component.name: Related place/location two identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of a second related place/location by code.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Related place/location two
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of a second related place/location by name.

medi:field.name: Relation, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify the relationship between two or more items.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 7: A group of segments specifying the currencies and related dates/periods valid for the whole invoice. Currency data maybe omitted in national applications but will be required for international transactions.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currencies required in the invoice e.g. the invoice currency. A rate of exchange may be given to convert a reference currency into a target currency.

medi:field.name: CURRENCY DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: The usage to which a currency relates.

medi:component.name: Currency details qualifier

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation:
Segment Group 14: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges for the whole invoice. The allowance or charge specified within this Segment group may either relate to the total invoice in which case it cannot be overridden at detail level, or it can relate to the line items as a default allowance/charge and can be overridden by the ALC Segment group within the detail section. Where relevant, additional information, tax and alternate currency details are to be indicated in the TAX and MOA segments.
The basis for the calculation of the allowance/charge may be a quantity, a percentage, an amount or a rate and one of the Segment group 15-19 should be used accordingly.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment identifying the charge or allowance and, where necessary, its calculation sequence.

medi:field.name: Allowance or charge qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Specification of an allowance or charge for the service specified.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of allowance/charge information by number and/or code.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Number assigned by a party referencing an allowance, promotion, deal or charge.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of how allowances or charges are to be settled.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating the sequence of cumulated calculations to be agreed between interchange partners.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.name: Reference qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a reference segment or a reference number.

medi:component.name: Reference number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification number the nature and function of which can be qualified by an entry in data element 1153 Reference qualifier.

medi:component.name: Line number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of the line in the document/message referenced in 1154 Reference number.

medi:component.name: Reference version number
medi:component.medi:documentation: To uniquely identify a reference by its revision number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 16: A group of segments specifying the quantity of the allowance or charge with its measure unit specifier. A range to which the allowance or charge applies may be specified e.g. An allowance of a free quantity of 20 pieces may be specified if the goods quantity ordered is greater than 1000 pieces.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the allowance or charge.

medi:field.name: QUANTITY DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Quantity information in a transaction, qualified when relevant.

medi:component.name: Quantity qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a quantity.

medi:component.name: Quantity
medi:component.medi:documentation: Numeric value of a quantity.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range to which the allowance or charge applies.

medi:field.name: Range type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of range.

medi:field.name: RANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Range minimum and maximum limits.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.name: Range minimum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 17: A group of segments specifying the percentage for the allowance or charge, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is calculated as 5% of the goods value or a price reduction of 5% may be specified if the goods quantity ordered is within the range 5 tons to 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment identifying the percentage and the percentage basis for the calculation of the allowance or charge.

medi:field.name: PERCENTAGE DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Percentage relating to a specified basis.

medi:component.name: Percentage qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the usage of a percentage.

medi:component.name: Percentage
medi:component.medi:documentation: Value expressed as a percentage of a specified amount.

medi:component.name: Percentage basis, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the application of a percentage.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the percentage.

medi:field.name: Range type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of range.

medi:field.name: RANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Range minimum and maximum limits.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.name: Range minimum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 18: A group of segments specifying a monetary amount for an allowance or charge. A range to which the allowance or charge applies can be specified, e.g. an allowance of 5000 BEF may be specified if goods value ordered is greater than 100000 BEF.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the monetary amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:field.name: MONETARY AMOUNT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetary amount in a specified currency.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount type qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of type of amount.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of monetary units.

medi:component.name: Currency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name or symbol of the monetary unit involved in the transaction.

medi:component.name: Currency qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to data element 6345 Currency.

medi:component.name: Status, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Provides information regarding the status of an instruction.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the allowance/charge amount.

medi:field.name: Range type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of range.

medi:field.name: RANGE

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.name: Range minimum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 19: A group of segments specifying the rate per unit and basis to which the allowance or charge applies, e.g. the allowance/charge amount is 3 DEM per 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment specifying the rate per unit and the basis for calculation.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Rate per unit and rate basis.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:field.name: RANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Range minimum and maximum limits.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.name: Range minimum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 20: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the allowance or charge and, when necessary.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying the tax type, category and rate, or exemption, related to the allowance or charge.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Number assigned to a purchaser (buyer, orderer) by a tax jurisdiction (state, country, etc).

medi:component.medi:documentation: Provides information regarding the status of an instruction.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 22: -SG24-SG25-SG26-SG27-SG29-SG30-SG31-SG35-SG41-SG43-SG44 A group of segments providing details of the individual invoiced items. There must be at least one occurrence of Segment group 22 within an invoice, but not necessarily in a credit note or a debit note. This Segment group may be repeated to give sub-line details.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the line item by the line number and configuration level, and additionally, identifying the product or service invoiced. Other product identification numbers, e.g. Buyer product number etc., can be specified within the following PIA segment.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Serial number designating each separate item within a series of articles.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment enabling the physical measurements of the invoiced item to be specified where this is required for full identification of the product. medi:segment.name: Quantity variances
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QVA, A segment identifying quantity variances, between, e.g. quantity delivered/invoiced and quantity ordered.

medi:field.name: QUANTITY DIFFERENCE INFORMATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Information on quantity difference.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Numeric value of variance between ordered/shipped/invoiced quantities.

medi:component.name: Quantity qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a quantity.

medi:field.name: Discrepancy, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code defining the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and invoiced, or shipped and invoiced for a line item or transaction.

medi:field.name: REASON FOR CHANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code and/or description motivating a price or quantity change. Note: Marked for deletion. Not to be used for new development, use C960 instead. C262 will be deleted from the 95.1 Directory.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the reason for a change.

medi:component.name: Change reason
medi:component.medi:documentation: Description of the reason for a change.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying subject of a free text.

medi:field.name: Text function, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying how to handle the text.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 23: A group of segments specifying any monetary amounts relating to the products and when necessary a currency.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying any monetary amounts relating to the product, e.g. item amount, insurance value, customs value.

medi:field.name: MONETARY AMOUNT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetary amount in a specified currency.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount type qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of type of amount.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of monetary units.

medi:component.name: Currency qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to data element 6345 Currency.

medi:component.name: Status, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Provides information regarding the status of an instruction.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currencies required in the line item, when is different from the heading currencies. A rate of exchange may given to convert a reference currency into a target currency.

medi:field.name: CURRENCY DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: The usage to which a currency relates.

medi:component.name: Currency details qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the usage to which the currency relates.

medi:component.name: Currency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name or symbol of the monetary unit involved in the transaction.

medi:component.name: Currency qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to data element 6345 Currency.

medi:component.name: Currency rate base
medi:component.medi:documentation: Multiplying factor used in expressing the number of currency units.

medi:field.name: CURRENCY DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: The usage to which a currency relates.

medi:component.name: Currency details qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the usage to which the currency relates.

medi:component.name: Currency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name or symbol of the monetary unit involved in the transaction.

medi:component.name: Currency qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to data element 6345 Currency.

medi:component.name: Currency rate base
medi:component.medi:documentation: Multiplying factor used in expressing the number of currency units.

medi:field.name: Rate of exchange
medi:field.medi:documentation: The rate at which one specified currency is expressed in another specified currency.

medi:field.name: Currency market exchange, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the market upon which the currency exchange rate is based.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 24: A group of segments specifying the terms of payment for the line item where this is different to that specified in the heading section.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms basis
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAT, A segment identifying the payment terms and date/time basis.

medi:field.name: Payment terms type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of payment terms.

medi:field.name: PAYMENT TERMS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Terms of payment code from a specified source.

medi:component.name: Terms of payment identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the terms of payment between the parties to a transaction (generic term).

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Terms of payment
medi:component.medi:documentation: Conditions of payment between the parties to a transaction (generic term).

medi:component.name: Terms of payment
medi:component.medi:documentation: Conditions of payment between the parties to a transaction (generic term).

medi:field.name: TERMS/TIME INFORMATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Time details in payment terms.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code relating payment terms to the date of a specific event.

medi:component.name: Time relation, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code relating payment terms to a time before, on or after the reference date.

medi:component.name: Type of period, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Agreed or specified period of time (coded).

medi:component.name: Number of periods
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of periods of the type indicated in data element 2151 Type of period, coded.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment giving the specific date/time/period, if needed, of any payments, discounts, installments etc.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying discount, interest, penalty as well as installment percentage.

medi:field.name: PERCENTAGE DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Percentage relating to a specified basis.

medi:component.name: Percentage qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the usage of a percentage.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Value expressed as a percentage of a specified amount.

medi:component.name: Percentage basis, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the application of a percentage.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying amounts related to payment discount penalties or installments.

medi:field.name: MONETARY AMOUNT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetary amount in a specified currency.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of type of amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 25: A group of segments identifying the relevant pricing information for the goods or services invoiced.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the price type and amount. The price used in the calculation of the line amount will be identified as 'Price'. Indication of "net price" or "gross price" can be given in 5387 "Price type qualifier".

medi:field.name: PRICE INFORMATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of price type, price and related details.

medi:component.name: Price qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a type of price.

medi:component.name: Price
medi:component.medi:documentation: The monetary value associated with a purchase or sale of an article, product or service.

medi:component.name: Price type, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the type of price of an item.

medi:component.name: Price type qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying pricing specification.

medi:component.name: Unit price basis
medi:component.medi:documentation: Basis on which the unit price/rate applies.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:field.name: Sub-line price change, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating disposition of the price change of a sub-line item.

medi:segment.name: Additional price information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: API, A segment to identify pricing information such as a price multiplier, the class or type of trade and additionally identifying the reason for any changes.

medi:field.name: Class of trade, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the class of trade.

medi:field.name: PRICE MULTIPLIER INFORMATION

medi:component.medi:documentation: Rate to be used to multiply a price.

medi:component.name: Price multiplier qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Type of price multiplier.

medi:component.name: Change reason, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the reason for a change.

medi:component.name: Change reason
medi:component.medi:documentation: Description of the reason for a change.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to identify the ranges(quantity, amount, etc.) to which the additional price information applies.

medi:field.name: Range type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of range.

medi:field.name: RANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Range minimum and maximum limits.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:component.name: Reference version number
medi:component.medi:documentation: To uniquely identify a reference by its revision number.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment specifying the number and type of packages for the line item, e.g. number and type of pallets.

medi:field.name: Relation, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify the relationship between two or more items.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment specifying the quantity delivered to the identified location.

medi:field.name: QUANTITY DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Quantity information in a transaction, qualified when relevant.

medi:component.name: Quantity qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a quantity.

medi:component.name: Quantity
medi:component.medi:documentation: Numeric value of a quantity.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates and/or times that the delivery has been made.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 30: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the line item, and when necessary, the location(s) to which that tax information relates.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment specifying a tax type, category and rate, or exemption, relating to the line item.

medi:field.name: Duty/tax/fee function qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the function of an duty, tax or fee information.

medi:field.name: DUTY/TAX/FEE TYPE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code and/or name identifying duty, tax or fee.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee type, coded

medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.name: DUTY/TAX/FEE DETAIL
medi:field.medi:documentation: Rate of duty/tax/fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee rate identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the rate of duty or tax or fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Rate of duty or tax or fee applicable to commodities or of tax applicable to services.

medi:component.name: Duty/tax/fee rate basis identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the various elements of tax combination to be attributed to a commodity.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying a tax/duty/fee category within a tax/duty/fee type system.

medi:field.name: Party tax identification number
medi:field.medi:documentation: Number assigned to a purchaser (buyer, orderer) by a tax jurisdiction (state, country, etc).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount for the identified tax/fee.

medi:field.name: MONETARY AMOUNT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetary amount in a specified currency.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of type of amount.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount

medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name or symbol of the monetary unit involved in the transaction.

medi:component.name: Currency qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to data element 6345 Currency.

medi:component.name: Status, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Provides information regarding the status of an instruction.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating the location to which the tax or exemption specified in the TAX segment applies, e.g. city or state or country tax.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the function of a location.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a location by code or name.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Place/location
medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of place/location, other than 3164 City name.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification the first related location by code or name.

medi:component.name: Related place/location one identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the first related place/location by code.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.name: Relation, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify the relationship between two or more items.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 31: A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information, relevant to the line item only.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties, in coded or clear form, and their functions relevant to the line item.
It is recommended that where possible only the coded form of the party ID should be specified e.g. The Buyer and Seller are known to each other, thus only the coded ID is required, but the Consignee or Delivery address may vary and would have to be clearly specified, preferably in structured format.

medi:field.name: Party qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.

medi:field.name: PARTY IDENTIFICATION DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a transaction party by code.

medi:component.name: Party id identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying a party involved in a transaction.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Unstructured name and address: one to five lines.

medi:field.name: Country, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of a country or other geographical entity as specified in ISO 3166.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving more specific location information of the party specified in the NAD segment e.g. internal site/building number.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a location by code or name.
