medi:field.name: Relation, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify the relationship between two or more items.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 32: A group of segment for giving references only relevant to the specified party rather than the whole line item.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference by its number and where appropriate a line number within a document.

medi:field.name: REFERENCE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.name: Reference qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a reference segment or a reference number.

medi:component.name: Reference number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification number the nature and function of which can be qualified by an entry in data element 1153 Reference qualifier.

medi:component.name: Line number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of the line in the document/message referenced in 1154 Reference number.

medi:component.name: Reference version number
medi:component.medi:documentation: To uniquely identify a reference by its revision number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 33: A group of segments identifying the documentary requirements of the specified party.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying and providing information relating to the documents required by the party specified by the NAD segment.

medi:field.name: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE NAME
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a type of document/message by code or name. Code preferred.

medi:component.name: Document/message name, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Document/message identifier expressed in code.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Document/message name
medi:component.medi:documentation: Plain language identifier specifying the function of a document/message.

medi:field.name: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of document/message by number, status, source and/or language.

medi:component.name: Document/message number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Reference number assigned to the document/message by the issuer.

medi:component.name: Document/message status, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify the status of a document/message.

medi:component.name: Document/message source
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the source from which the printed information is to be or has been obtained.

medi:component.name: Language, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code of language (ISO 639-1988).

medi:field.name: Communication channel identifier, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the type of communication channel being used.

medi:field.name: Number of copies of document required
medi:field.medi:documentation: Number of originals or copies of a document stipulated or referred to as being required.

medi:field.name: Number of originals of document required
medi:field.medi:documentation: Specification of the number of originals of a stipulated document that are required.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time of the document.

medi:field.name: DATE/TIME/PERIOD
medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to the specified date/time/period type.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a date, time or period.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period
medi:component.medi:documentation: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

medi:component.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Specification of the representation of a date, a date and time or of a period.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 34: A group of segments giving contact details of the specific person or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department, and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

medi:field.name: Contact function, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g. department or person).

medi:field.name: DEPARTMENT OR EMPLOYEE DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code and/or name of a department or employee. Code preferred.

medi:component.name: Department or employee identification
medi:component.medi:documentation: Internal identification code.

medi:component.name: Department or employee
medi:component.medi:documentation: The department or person within an organizational entity.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communications type and number for the contact specified in the CTA segment.

medi:field.name: COMMUNICATION CONTACT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Communication number of a department or employee in a specified channel.

medi:component.name: Communication number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Complete communication number including country or area code when applicable. Also see: 3153 Communication channel identifier.

medi:component.name: Communication channel qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the type of communication channel being used.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 35: A group of segments specifying allowances and charges for the line item where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment identifying the charge or allowance and, where necessary its calculation sequence.

medi:field.name: Allowance or charge qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Specification of an allowance or charge for the service specified.

medi:field.name: ALLOWANCE/CHARGE INFORMATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of allowance/charge information by number and/or code.

medi:component.name: Allowance or charge number
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number assigned by a party referencing an allowance, promotion, deal or charge.

medi:component.name: Charge/allowance description, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a charge or allowance.

medi:field.name: Settlement, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of how allowances or charges are to be settled.

medi:field.name: Calculation sequence indicator, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating the sequence of cumulated calculations to be agreed between interchange partners.

medi:field.name: SPECIAL SERVICES IDENTIFICATION
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a special service by a code from a specified source.

medi:component.name: Special services, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying a special service.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:component.name: Special service
medi:component.medi:documentation: Description of a special service.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that allowance or charge specified is subject to special conditions owing to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

medi:field.name: Country of origin, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Country in which the goods have been produced or manufactured, according to criteria laid down for the purposes of application of the Customs tariff, of quantitative restrictions, or of any other measure related to trade.

medi:field.name: Type of duty regime, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the statement of the full/preferential regime according to which duty is assessed.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:field.name: Special conditions, coded
medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of a specific condition.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 36: A group of segments specifying the quantity of the allowance or charge with its measure unit specifier. A range to which the allowance or charge applies may be specified e.g. An allowance of a free quantity of 20 pieces may be specified if the goods quantity ordered is greater than 1000 pieces.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the type of quantity and the quantity related to the allowance or charge.

medi:field.name: QUANTITY DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Quantity information in a transaction, qualified when relevant.

medi:component.name: Quantity qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a quantity.

medi:component.name: Quantity
medi:component.medi:documentation: Numeric value of a quantity.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range to which the allowance or charge applies.

medi:field.name: Range type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of range.

medi:field.name: RANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Range minimum and maximum limits.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.name: Range minimum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 37: A group of segments specifying the percentage for the allowance or charge, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is calculated as 5% of the goods value or a price reduction of 5% may be specified if the goods quantity ordered is within the range 5 tons to 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment identifying the percentage and the percentage basis for the calculation of the allowance or charge.

medi:field.name: PERCENTAGE DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Percentage relating to a specified basis.

medi:component.name: Percentage qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the usage of a percentage.

medi:component.name: Percentage
medi:component.medi:documentation: Value expressed as a percentage of a specified amount.

medi:component.name: Percentage basis, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the application of a percentage.

medi:component.name: Code list qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of a code list.

medi:component.name: Code list responsible agency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code identifying the agency responsible for a code list.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the percentage.

medi:field.name: Range type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of range.

medi:field.name: RANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Range minimum and maximum limits.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.name: Range minimum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 38: A group of segments specifying a monetary amount for an allowance or charge. A range to which the allowance or charge applies can be specified, e.g. an allowance of 5000 BEF may be specified if goods value ordered is greater than 100000 BEF.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the monetary amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:field.name: MONETARY AMOUNT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetary amount in a specified currency.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount type qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of type of amount.

medi:component.name: Monetary amount
medi:component.medi:documentation: Number of monetary units.

medi:component.name: Currency, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the name or symbol of the monetary unit involved in the transaction.

medi:component.name: Currency qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to data element 6345 Currency.

medi:component.name: Status, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Provides information regarding the status of an instruction.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, a range for the application of the allowance/charge amount.

medi:field.name: Range type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of range.

medi:field.name: RANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Range minimum and maximum limits.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.name: Range minimum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 39: A group of segments specifying the rate per unit and basis to which the allowance or charge applies, e.g. The allowance/charge amount is 3 DEM per 10 tons.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, A segment specifying the rate per unit and the basis for calculation.

medi:field.name: RATE DETAILS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Rate per unit and rate basis.

medi:component.name: Rate type qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of rate.

medi:component.name: Rate per unit
medi:component.medi:documentation: Rate per unit specified in the unit price basis.

medi:component.name: Unit price basis
medi:component.medi:documentation: Basis on which the unit price/rate applies.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment specifying, if required, the range for the application of the allowance/charge rate.

medi:field.name: Range type qualifier
medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the type of range.

medi:field.name: RANGE
medi:field.medi:documentation: Range minimum and maximum limits.

medi:component.name: Measure unit qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:component.name: Range minimum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Minimum of a range.

medi:component.name: Range maximum
medi:component.medi:documentation: Maximum of a range.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 40: A group of segments specifying tax related information for the allowance or charge and, when necessary.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying a tax/duty/fee category within a tax/duty/fee type system.

medi:field.name: Party tax identification number
medi:field.medi:documentation: Number assigned to a purchaser (buyer, orderer) by a tax jurisdiction (state, country, etc).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount for the allowance or charge.

medi:field.name: MONETARY AMOUNT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetary amount in a specified currency.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of type of amount.

medi:component.name: Currency qualifier
medi:component.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to data element 6345 Currency.

medi:component.name: Status, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Provides information regarding the status of an instruction.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment Group 41: A group of segments identifying the mode and means of transport, location and relevant dates and times for transportation, relating to the line item, where this is different to or not specified within the heading section.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment specifying the mode, means and identification of the transport for the goods in the line item.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Qualifier giving a specific meaning to the transport details.

medi:field.name: Conveyance reference number
medi:field.medi:documentation: Unique reference given by the carrier to a certain journey or departure of a means of transport (generic term).

medi:field.name: MODE OF TRANSPORT
medi:field.medi:documentation: Method of transport code or name. Code preferred.

medi:component.name: Mode of transport, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Coded method of transport used for the carriage of the goods.

medi:component.name: Mode of transport

medi:field.name: TRANSPORT MEANS
medi:field.medi:documentation: Code and/or name identifying the inactive means of transport. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code defining the type of the means of transport being utilized.

medi:component.name: Type of means of transport
medi:component.medi:documentation: Description of the type of the means of transport being utilized.

medi:component.name: Excess transportation responsibility, coded
medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of responsibility for excess transportation.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Customer provided authorization number to allow supplier to ship goods under specific freight conditions. This number will be transmitted back to customer in the dispatch advice message.

In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Determines the source data elements in the message which forms the basis for 6066 Control value.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Value obtained from summing the values specified by the Control Qualifier throughout the message (Hash total).

medi:component.medi:documentation: Indication of the unit of measurement in which weight (mass), capacity, length, area, volume or other quantity is expressed.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving the total amounts for the whole invoice message such as message monetary amount, message line item total amount, amount subject to payment discount, amount subject to tax, alternative currency total amount, total additional amount, sub-total amounts prepaid, total amount prepaid.
